location.sjis: ディックル鉱洞 エリア５

portrait_l.name: jade
portrait_l.sjis: ヤツの目の色が変わったぜ 面白い勝負になりそうだ
portrait_l.ascii: They've actually gotten serious. This'll be an interesting match

portrait_l.name: jade
portrait_l.sjis: お前は魔石を取り返すためにも がんばらなきゃな
portrait_l.ascii: You'll have to work hard to take the stone back.
